DOC.brief_summary: This study introduce multi-faceted intervention package implement newly develop network St. Paul 's Hospital Millennium Medical College ( St. Paul ) surround seven satellite health center . The goal ass group intervention improve skill confidence provider handle obstetric emergency , streamline referral process result improve maternal/newborn health outcome .
DOC.criteria: Sample population data collection instrument : Baseline/Endline : Key Informant Interviews : St. Paul hospital : Maternal Child Health ( MCH ) Head , Midwife/nurse Labor Delivery ( L & D ) , Midwife/nurse Emergency Health Centers : Medical Director , Head MCH ( midwife ) Midwife L & D , Referral focal person Health Facility Assessment : Manager/most senior health worker ask ( one facility ) Provider Survey : All provider MCH hospital health center level Chart review : All delivery center screen intervention phase . Data every birth collect log book facility . The data collector find medical record patient assess Standard Care ( SOC ) Antenatal care ( ANC ) available chart , L & D screen obstetric complication . If complication , near miss data collect . Telephone registration log book : phone call HC Hospital Facility Checklists : Forms complete Supportive Supervision Teams quarterly visit Standardized BEmONC train evaluation Will give every provider undergo training , part training curriculum . Monthly mentor evaluation six month posttraining mentorship , provider undergo BEmONC training . Supportive Supervision Gap Identification Checklists Collected quarterly 9 facility
